apis.description: Display a listing of the resource.

operations.summary: Get a list of all NPCs

parameters.name: npc_id
parameters.description: ID of NPC that needs to be fetched

responseMessages.message: NPC not found. His stealth bonus must be better than your perception check.

operations.notes: A comma delimited list of ids can also be used

data.description: Array of NPC objects. If only one NPC is requested, this will not be an array and will instead hold a singular NPC object.

race.description: The NPC's race - which apparently can be blank, don't look at me.

class.description: The NPC's class. Pretty straight forward. Except when this field is blank. I do not know why.

ability_scores.description: This NPC's ability scores or 'holy crap, these random numbers are better than all the players.'

special_abilities.description: Any special abilities this NPC has. Feel free to make up your own when your PCs are getting to big for their armor.

before_combat.description: A description of any special actions to be taken before this NPC lays down the hammer. Not a real one, cuz this could be a sorcerer or something.

after_combat.description: A description of any special actions to be taken when the dust settles.

source.description: The source material in which this information can be found.
